overview: The Game was conceived after a month of physical confinement with my family during quarantine, and it arose out of the accumulation of whacked out emotions we grapple with daily. Itâ€™s a game that allows us to give into the loss of perspective that this moment has created: where our sense of time, reality, and the future has radically shifted. We invite others to watch and play The Game, share your videos, and allow us to create a worldwide collection, archiving the tragedy and absurdity of all our confinement.
title: The Game
